DOC.brief_summary: Prospective cohort, monocentric non-randomized and interventional clinical study in ICU assessing the evolution of body composition using bioelectrical impedance analysis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Indices of Body Composition During Ultramarathon : Measure by Body Bioelectrical Impedance
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective, monocentric non-randomized and interventional clinical study in ICU assessing the evolution of body composition using bioelectrical impedance analysis (phase angle, fat mass, muscle mass, fat-free mass, body water) before and after ultramarathon.
